original: atra hi amāvasyāvasāne pūrṇimāvasāne vā parvasandhau rāhormaṇḍale raviśaśinormaṇḍalaṁ praviśanti maṇḍalaśabda gātra ṣaṣṭināḍikā ekanakṣatrabhogaḥ  #

original: ketuḥ sūryamaṇḍale praviśya pratyahaṁ daṇḍacatuṣṭayaṁ ṣaḍviṁśati liptāścārkkabhogastamadhikasārddhaṁ liptā dvayañca śīghracāre krameṇāgrato  #

vakra cāre utkramena pṛṣṭatas vicarati
evam varṣa trayam sthitvā niḥsarati

original: evaṁ sārddhamāsānte punaḥ sūryamaṇdale tathaiva varṣatrayaṁ yāvadadṛśyā bhavati |

original: śīghrakarmaṇi sūryamaṇḍalāduditasya grahasya kragamane caturdaśacaraṇaghaṭikārddha pūrvāddhe bhogaḥ śīghracāre ucyate |

original: atra krame pūrvārddhe dhanavṛddhiḥ grahāśca pūrvābhimukhāḥ |

original: eṣāmanyādiṅ mukhatvamariṣṭādivaśena prakṛtyā tu rāhuḥ paścimābhimukho merūṁ pradakṣiṇayatyapare grahāḥ |
